name: Dino Gun 3D: jurassic survival
description:
Would you like to test your concentration and speed? Install a new, super cool shooter Dino Gun 3D! Once you do this, you virtually move to a world of wildlife, filled with huge and dangerous dinosaurs in the hot year after the apocalypse.

***

Will you or they become a target? Consider that the window of civilization has long disappeared, there was only you - the last person against the evil dragons in the arena. You have to become a tough sniper, a war hero, who is ordered to create a new civilization.

***

To survive in this world of dangerous giant animals from the survival period, you should develop the right strategy.

***

Dino Gun - not an easy action game for survival. The game requires great concentration, speed of movement and accurate shooting. And even if you do not yet have the skills of a hunter, do not get upset. This is the perfect platform for training your hunting instincts.

***

You can choose the mode in which you feel most comfortable. The Story Line mode will give you a unique opportunity to experience the spirit of adventure. You will appear on the ground where people no longer live, but only shadow of dangerous creatures. Being the only survivor, your task will be to survive as long as possible! Explore the earth, kill all the dinosaurs that will appear on your way by gun, bow or other weapon.

***

Choosing a difficult mode (Hard Mode), you will have to kill seven veloziraptorov at the first level. Believe me, some of the world will be much safer without these aggressive creatures! As you become more experienced, the tasks will become more complicated. But you're not afraid of problems, are you? Having chosen Trophy Quest mode, you can become a virtual collector of dinosaur skulls. Is not it thrilling to have a huge mountain of skulls?

***

The first thing you notice when you download the free simulator Dino Gun 3D, it's a fascinating sound effects. The developers have created a truly amazing soundtrack to the first person shooter. Music predisposes to exciting, active hunting. The same can be said about the chart. Beasts seem quite realistic, especially when they attack with the intention of engulfing you.

***

The game definitely has no psychological harm to children: here you will not see much blood or violence. This is a simple amusing shooter that keeps you tied to hunting for dinosaurs in the wild. Download and enjoy the game offline, completely free!
